documentation.text:
@dev Get the list with all credits.
 returns credits Returns list of credit addresses.

@dev Get all users credits.
 returns users[msg.sender].allCredits Return user credits.

@dev Function to toggle active state of credit contract.
 @param _credit The credit's address.

applyForCredit(uint256,uint256,uint256,b.details: Credit application function. The function publishesh another contract which is the credit contract. The owner of the new contract is the present contract.

params.creditDescription: The description of the funding. returns credit Return credit address.

changeCreditState(address).details: Function to toggle active state of credit contract.

changeCreditState(address,uint8).details: Function to switch active state of a credit.

getCredits().details: Get the list with all credits. returns credits Returns list of credit addresses.

getUserCredits().details: Get all users credits. returns users[msg.sender].allCredits Return user credits.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._borrower: The user's address. returns users[_borrower].fraudStatus Boolean of the new fraud status.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
